reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's fabric durable and appreciate its style, with one noting how the details enhance its appearance. Moreover, the sweater is comfortable, ideal for cooler weather, and features cotton material. Customers like the color options, with one mentioning the shade suits every individual style. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable Open-Front Black Cardigan
items.body: I recently purchased this open-front black cardigan, and it has quickly become a wardrobe staple for me. The baggy fit adds a relaxed and effortless vibe, making it perfect for both casual outings and cozy nights in. One of the standout features is the gorgeous color options available. While I opted for the classic black, the variety of colors offered ensures there's a shade to suit every individual style. The cardigan's open-front design adds a touch of modernity, making it easy to layer over different outfits. The baggy fit not only contributes to its comfort but also allows for versatile styling. Whether paired with jeans and a tee for a laid-back look or thrown over a dress for a more polished ensemble, this cardigan effortlessly complements various outfits. The material is soft and cozy, making it ideal for cooler weather. The quality of the fabric ensures durability, and the cardigan maintains its shape even after multiple wears. Overall, I highly recommend this open-front black cardigan for anyone looking to add a stylish and comfortable layer to their wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Kimberly Castle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and super cute!
items.body: Super cute and great quality. I am always hesitant with buying clothes from Amazon, especially sweaters, but this one is great! It's warm, color is great, love the arm patches - definitely a Free People look a like cardigan. I wish it came in black. It would be a staple! Read more
items.author: JessKas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color is off but nice cardigan otherwise
items.body: Disappointed that the color didn‚Äôt look like the photo. I was hoping for that contrasting/variegated dye look between the seams. It is still a cool sweater just not as cool as the photos portrayed it. I got the light coffee color. Quality is still good. It‚Äôs a little bit off of the shape and details compared to the photos. However standalone it‚Äôs a good cardigan. The length is what I expected, and the fit through the arms is good on me. It‚Äôs still cool looking. I am 5‚Äô8‚Äù and 200 lbs and got the extra large. Read more
items.author: K8D

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best.
items.body: Cute, but not super cozy. It is an odd, sort of scratchy material. I ordered the ‚ÄúArmy Greenish Khaki‚Äù color- but this is just light brown. No green tone at all. I washed it, and hung to dry because I fully anticipate this to shrink to doll sized if it is dried in a dryer. Still rough feeling. It will still be cute for our trip, but I won‚Äôt order again. Read more
items.author: Maleah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy!
items.body: The quality is great and the color is accurate! Also, the design is as expected, I will definitely be ordering another one in a different color! Great buy for sure! Read more
items.author: Josie LaBord

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Most Horrific Smell ü§Æ
items.body: Be cautious of chemicals in your clothing!! I wish I returned this immediately instead of trying to get the stink out. It arrived with the most nauseating and headache inducing chemical smell. I washed it three times and the smell won't go away. I tried to air it out and still nothing. I used Zero Ordor and it still smells terribly. It's going in the garbage, as wasteful as I don't want to be but it's dangerous to put something like that on your skin. It's otherwise a nice looking sweater. Read more
items.author: MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute red cardigan
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Good quality and I really loved this red color. Wore it on vacation and most recently on Halloween truck or treating with my son. Good for chilly nights. Fit well. Read more
items.author: Jordin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: This is a hefty knit, with a lot of style. Works well for Boho style, or just a cool relaxed look with some uniqueness. Higher in the back than the front. I like the two different materials together, a fabric and a hefty knit. The pockets are lined with a soft knit. This is perfect for cooler weather. I like it as is, but I am going to sew on a fat ribbon, so I can close the two sides together. I am 5‚Äô 2‚Äù, 179lbs, with short arms and curves. The Medium fits well, not tight, not oversized, the two sides do meet in the middle. I turn up the cuffs. Since the seams are finished on the outside, when you turn up the cuffs they look smooth and perfect. Very happy with this. Read more
items.author: BusyKnitter

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rurplish Red, Fluorescent Green, Apricot Khaki, Dark Grey, Black, Light Yellow, Light Coffee Brown, Red, Cream Beige, Army Greenish Khaki, Purple, Royal Blue, Nude Pink, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
